page.title: 18Clothes and Fashion
page.content: There are all sorts of different clothes for men and women. The women wear all sorts of{different coloured dresses,blouses,jumpers,trousers,socks and shorts. Most clothes seem to be red,white,pastel blue,green and pink at the moment. There are lots of {different styles}in{skirts}and {dresses.}Most of them have{big buttons and they have{big belts}which you hang some of the dress over. There are lots of different styles in{trousers}as well. You can get trousers that are called{jeans,}you can also get ones that have{zips}and{pockets}on them and ones that have a{pleated style}across the top. You can gets lots of different types of fashionable shoes in most of the colours clothes are. You can get{shoes}in{pointed style or{rounded.}You can also get {high heeled}shoes.
